Name: ²Pattern
About the game: Take an atmospheric trip through a sliding puzzle game! In ²Pattern, you have to move and swap pieces on a side and the other to reproduce a minimalist pattern. Currently, there is 50+ puzzle to complete ! No rush.. you have no time limitation , no needs to get all stars . Play at your ease and just... let it go.. (Still, you can challenge yourself by activating the timer and seeking the 3 stars if you want to!) Headphone highly recommanded!
